Estimate Beta parameters

estimateBetas.Rd

This function estimates the Beta parameters for a distribution given the correlations.

Usage

estimateBetas(
  corSet,
  left = 0,
  right = 0,
  plot = FALSE,
  fine = NULL,
  trim = 0.01,
  ...
)

Arguments

corSet

Table of correlation coefficients.

left

Left parameter for the Beta distribution.

right

Right parameter for the Beta distribution.

plot

If TRUE, a plot of the distribution is shown.

fine

Number of bins for the histogram.

trim

Proportion of the data to be trimmed.

Value

A vector with the two Beta parameters.
